data.oai_dc:dc: The MiLES16 database is a dataset of 15 root, leaf and plant functional traits compiled from our own experiment in 2016. Data are provided for 39 accessions from 3 sub-species of Triticum turgidum. It contains a copy of the main data files used for this paper, as well as a description of the studied variables (see below).
agroecology|crop|ecophysiological trade-off|functional coordination|human selection|phenotypic integration|phenotypic space|plant breeding|plant economics spectrum|plant functional trait
